What’s wrong!?\""},{"lineNumber":159011,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふざけるなー！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Don't mess around!"},{"lineNumber":159012,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ハウゼルがいなくなったんだぞ！？","translatedEnglishLine":" Hausel is gone, you know!?\""},{"lineNumber":159013,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いやだぁあぁあぁあぁあ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Noooohhhhhh!"},{"lineNumber":159014,"originalJapaneseLine":"　誰か助けてくれえええええ！」","translatedEnglishLine":" Someone help meeeeee!\""},{"lineNumber":159015,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だ、誰か来てくれー！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"S-Someone come here—!"},{"lineNumber":159016,"originalJapaneseLine":"　将軍の乱心だーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":" The general’s gone mad—!\""},{"lineNumber":159017,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人ハウゼルの失踪。","translatedEnglishLine":"The disappearance of the demon Hausel."},{"lineNumber":159018,"originalJapaneseLine":"これは魔軍側に大きな衝撃を与えた。","translatedEnglishLine":"This dealt a great shock to the demon army side."},{"lineNumber":159019,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"............"},{"lineNumber":159020,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"……"},{"lineNumber":159021,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"............\""},{"lineNumber":159022,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんなんだろうね、あれは」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What do you suppose that is?\""},{"lineNumber":159023,"originalJapaneseLine":"エクスは小高い丘の上から、","translatedEnglishLine":"Ex watched from a small hilltop,"},{"lineNumber":159024,"originalJapaneseLine":"自分の目で魔軍の不審な動きを眺めていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"observing the suspicious movements of the demon army with his own eyes."},{"lineNumber":159025,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええ、何か……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, it’s like..."},{"lineNumber":159026,"originalJapaneseLine":"　兵達が動揺しているような……」","translatedEnglishLine":" the soldiers are unsettled somehow…\""},{"lineNumber":159027,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああっ！　ご覧下さい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah! Look over there!\""},{"lineNumber":159028,"originalJapaneseLine":"一人の士官が指さす先、","translatedEnglishLine":"Where an officer pointed,"},{"lineNumber":159029,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこでは魔軍の複数の部隊が","translatedEnglishLine":"several units of the demon army"},{"lineNumber":159030,"originalJapaneseLine":"後方へと逃げていく最中だった。","translatedEnglishLine":"were in the middle of retreating to the rear."},{"lineNumber":159031,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……事情はよく分からないが、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...I don’t fully understand the situation,"},{"lineNumber":159032,"originalJapaneseLine":"　向こうは相当の混乱に陥っているようだ」","translatedEnglishLine":" but it seems they are in quite a state of confusion.\""},{"lineNumber":159033,"originalJapaneseLine":"「旗を掲げてあげて」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Raise the flag.\""},{"lineNumber":159034,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おお、では！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, understood!\""},{"lineNumber":159035,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もう詰み-ﾁｪｯｸﾒｲﾄ-のようだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It seems it’s checkmate already.\""},{"lineNumber":159036,"originalJapaneseLine":"「奪われたもの、全力で奪い返そうじゃないか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Let’s do our utmost to take back what was taken from us.\""},{"lineNumber":159037,"originalJapaneseLine":"「将軍！　あれを！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"General! That!\""},{"lineNumber":159038,"originalJapaneseLine":"「エクス殿の合図か……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Is that Lord Ex’s signal...?\""},{"lineNumber":159039,"originalJapaneseLine":"エクス達のいる筈の小高い丘から見えるは、","translatedEnglishLine":"From the small hill where Ex and the others should be,"},{"lineNumber":159040,"originalJapaneseLine":"突撃の意を示す深紅の旗。","translatedEnglishLine":"a crimson flag indicating an assault could be seen."},{"lineNumber":159041,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph...\""},{"lineNumber":159042,"originalJapaneseLine":"リックが高々と魔法剣バイ・ロードを掲げる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rick raised the magical sword Bai Road high."},{"lineNumber":159043,"originalJapaneseLine":"その赤い光はまるで旗のように揺らめき、","translatedEnglishLine":"The red light shimmered like a flag,"},{"lineNumber":159044,"originalJapaneseLine":"多くの者の目を引き、威光を示す。","translatedEnglishLine":"drawing many eyes and demonstrating prestige."},{"lineNumber":159045,"originalJapaneseLine":"「赤軍の兵達よ！　時は満ちた！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Soldiers of the Red Army! The time has come!\""},{"lineNumber":159046,"originalJapaneseLine":"「その身を返り血で深紅に染めよ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Drench yourselves in crimson with the blood of victory!"},{"lineNumber":159047,"originalJapaneseLine":"　突撃ィィィィィィーーーッ！！！！」","translatedEnglishLine":" Chargeeeeeeeeee!!!!\""},{"lineNumber":159048,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ウゥーーーラララララララァーーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Uuuuurararararaaaahhh!\""},{"lineNumber":159049,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"............"},{"lineNumber":159050,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"……"},{"lineNumber":159051,"originalJapaneseLine":"この戦いにより、リーザス軍は","translatedEnglishLine":"Because of this battle, the Rizas army"},{"lineNumber":159052,"originalJapaneseLine":"領地を大きく取り戻すに至った。","translatedEnglishLine":"was able to reclaim a large portion of their territory."},{"lineNumber":159053,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達はハウゼルを連れて、ランス城に戻っていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and the others returned to Rance Castle with Hausel."},{"lineNumber":159054,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス城――","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance Castle――"},{"lineNumber":159055,"originalJapaneseLine":"図書室――","translatedEnglishLine":"Library――"},{"lineNumber":159056,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わあ、すごい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wow, amazing!\""},{"lineNumber":159057,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス城の蔵書量を前に、","translatedEnglishLine":"In front of the vast collection of books at Rance Castle,"},{"lineNumber":159058,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハウゼルが歓喜の声を上げた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Hausel exclaimed with joy."},{"lineNumber":159059,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははは、そうかそうか気に入ったか。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahaha, is that so? You like it, huh?"},{"lineNumber":159060,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いくらでも読んでくれて構わんからな」","translatedEnglishLine":" Feel free to read as much as you want.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くっ、くぅぅうぅう……！」
魔物将軍は思いきり頭をかきむしった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon general fiercely scratched at his head.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ま、まずいまずいまずいぞ！）
（魔人ハウゼルをみすみす失ったと知られれば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (If they find out that we carelessly lost the demon Hausel,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私は確実にヨシフ様に……！）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will surely be subject to Lord Yosif...!)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物大将軍ヨシフの恐怖を思い出し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Remembering the terror of the demon general Yosif,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍は体を大きく震わせた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon general shook his body violently.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あああぁああぁぁああ！
もうおしまいだーーーー！」
「しょ、将軍！　どうされました！？」
「ふざけるなー！
ハウゼルがいなくなったんだぞ！？
「いやだぁあぁあぁあぁあ！
誰か助けてくれえええええ！」
「だ、誰か来てくれー！
将軍の乱心だーー！」
魔人ハウゼルの失踪。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The disappearance of the demon Hausel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これは魔軍側に大きな衝撃を与えた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This dealt a great shock to the demon army side.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんなんだろうね、あれは」
エクスは小高い丘の上から、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ex watched from a small hilltop,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分の目で魔軍の不審な動きを眺めていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: observing the suspicious movements of the demon army with his own eyes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええ、何か……
兵達が動揺しているような……」
「ああっ！　ご覧下さい！」
一人の士官が指さす先、
そこでは魔軍の複数の部隊が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: several units of the demon army

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後方へと逃げていく最中だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: were in the middle of retreating to the rear.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……事情はよく分からないが、
向こうは相当の混乱に陥っているようだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but it seems they are in quite a state of confusion."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「旗を掲げてあげて」
「おお、では！」
「もう詰み-ﾁｪｯｸﾒｲﾄ-のようだ」
「奪われたもの、全力で奪い返そうじゃないか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Let’s do our utmost to take back what was taken from us."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「将軍！　あれを！」
「エクス殿の合図か……」
エクス達のいる筈の小高い丘から見えるは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From the small hill where Ex and the others should be,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 突撃の意を示す深紅の旗。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a crimson flag indicating an assault could be seen.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リックが高々と魔法剣バイ・ロードを掲げる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rick raised the magical sword Bai Road high.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その赤い光はまるで旗のように揺らめき、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The red light shimmered like a flag,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 多くの者の目を引き、威光を示す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: drawing many eyes and demonstrating prestige.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「赤軍の兵達よ！　時は満ちた！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Soldiers of the Red Army! The time has come!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その身を返り血で深紅に染めよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Drench yourselves in crimson with the blood of victory!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 突撃ィィィィィィーーーッ！！！！」
「ウゥーーーラララララララァーーーー！」
この戦いにより、リーザス軍は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because of this battle, the Rizas army

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 領地を大きく取り戻すに至った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was able to reclaim a large portion of their territory.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達はハウゼルを連れて、ランス城に戻っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others returned to Rance Castle with Hausel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城――
図書室――
「わあ、すごい！」
ランス城の蔵書量を前に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In front of the vast collection of books at Rance Castle,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウゼルが歓喜の声を上げた。
「がははは、そうかそうか気に入ったか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahaha, is that so? You like it, huh?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いくらでも読んでくれて構わんからな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Feel free to read as much as you want."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その身を返り血で深紅に染めよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Drench yourselves in crimson with the blood of victory!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 突撃ィィィィィィーーーッ！！！！」
「ウゥーーーラララララララァーーーー！」
この戦いにより、リーザス軍は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because of this battle, the Rizas army

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 領地を大きく取り戻すに至った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was able to reclaim a large portion of their territory.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達はハウゼルを連れて、ランス城に戻っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others returned to Rance Castle with Hausel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城――
図書室――
「わあ、すごい！」
ランス城の蔵書量を前に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In front of the vast collection of books at Rance Castle,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウゼルが歓喜の声を上げた。
「がははは、そうかそうか気に入ったか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahaha, is that so? You like it, huh?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いくらでも読んでくれて構わんからな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Feel free to read as much as you want."
